H0.text: Who did Betty Boothroyd replace as Speaker of the House of Commons on April 27th 1992. Bernard Weatherill

H1.text: Who did Betty Boothroyd replace as Speaker of the House of Commons on April 27th 1992. Geoffrey Howe

H2.text: Who did Betty Boothroyd replace as Speaker of the House of Commons on April 27th 1992. Neil Kinnock

H3.text: Who did Betty Boothroyd replace as Speaker of the House of Commons on April 27th 1992. Jack Weatherill

A4.text: Following the 1987 general election Boothroyd became a Deputy Speaker to the Speaker Bernard Weatherill
